title: Oxygen consumption, body mass; 5 answer options 1

content.question: The fact that each line on the graph rises from left to right means that

choices.label: higher temperatures produce higher rates of metabolism
there were more large fish in the samples taken at high temperatures
larger fish consume more oxygen than smaller fish at all four temperatures
when measurements are taken for larger fish late in the day, observed values are higher
larger fish prefer to live at higher temperatures than do smaller fish

content.answer: larger fish consume more oxygen than smaller fish at all four temperatures

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
